structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.text: The commission shall study the retirement benefits, per diem, mileage, travel expenses and other allowances, reimbursements and emoluments of public officials, in order to make specific recommendations to the General Assembly.
law.history: Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 4, effective March 29, 1976.
